northern_tribes.name: Northern Tribes
northern_tribes.description: Hardy warriors from the frozen north. They respect strength and value honor in battle.

merchant_guild.name: Merchant Guild
merchant_guild.description: A coalition of wealthy traders who control the major trade routes. Gold speaks louder than swords.

forest_clans.name: Forest Clans
forest_clans.description: Reclusive hunters who fiercely guard their ancestral woodlands. They prefer to be left alone.

mountain_kingdom.name: Mountain Kingdom
mountain_kingdom.description: Master craftsmen who carve their homes from the living rock. Their fortresses are legendary.

coastal_federation.name: Coastal Federation
coastal_federation.description: A loose alliance of fishing villages and port towns. They control the seas and value freedom.
